Spearpoint Tower was an crucial defensive structure located within the city of Tulmon along the coast of the Lake of Steam in south Faer√ªn.
The tower was located at the end of Tulmons longest wharf along the harbor on the Bay of Balefires.
An estimated 3,650 soldiers of the Stone Spears, Tulmons standing army, used the tower as their main barracks.
Spearpoint Tower was outfitted with an assortment of catapults and ballistae that possessed sufficient range to harry any attacking ships. In order to keep their skills honed, the soldiers manning the war machines practiced by sinking leaky barges.
